articles.title: Gastro symptoms: Gastroenteritis outbreaks in Victoria surge to nearby double the average, spark urgent warning from Brett Sutton - 7NEWS
articles.description: Chief Health Officer Brett Sutton has detailed the best personal hygiene method to minimise the chance of spreading the virus.
articles.content:
Victorians should turn to soap and water rather than hand sanitiser to combat a growing number of gastro outbreaks in childcare centres.
